Tucson sends Perceptor a com link back. 

"Love is a power we all share, an=
d something that the enemy has no knowledge of.  It is that power that will=
 turn things around for us, and it is that power that will revive Rodimus P=
rime.  As long as we all hold onto that part of us, we will always be stron=
ger."
